The main function starts with printing a message and asking for input. After that a lot of operations occur that are difficult to understand. At the bottom of the function there is a memcmp call with the given and the stored password. The stored password is stored in plaintext and if we give â€œ^254N;bQF5x*quâ€ as input we will get shown an â€œAccess granted!â€ message.
